title: Goat’s saddle with artichokes, morels and wild garlic
description: If it’s all about lamb for you in springtime, think again. With the popularity of goats’ milk and cheese, the by-product goat meat is now gaining traction. Combined here with the spring flavours of morel mushrooms and wild garlic, it makes a wonderful roast dinner.
ingredients: 600g/21oz goat's rack and short saddle (aged for 2 weeks), trimmed
2 artichokes, trimmed, chokes removed, cut into quarters
1 tsp lazy garlic (1 garlic clove blended with 1 tsp olive oil)
